Description:
Exclusive Family Home in Peppercorns Estate
Sale by Set Date 6/8/2013
This exceptional, elevated property is located in the beautiful and exclusive Peppercorns Estate. Only a few years old and built by a prestigious local builder, the floor plan was designed perfectly for a corner allotment. Featuring enormous living spaces, the home is ideal for the growing family and impresses at every turn. The front entrance leads to the large formal lounge which is the perfect parent's retreat, a great study with private porch and the executive master bedroom behind double-doors with walk-in robe and magnificent ensuite. The spacious kitchen features exquisite silestone bench tops, plenty of cupboard and counter space including a large walk-in pantry, Blanco stainless steel appliances and 900mm oven. The kitchen opens out to the mammoth living/dining area that takes full advantage of the natural light with an abundance of windows and glass doors to outside. With a further three great sized bedrooms with built-in robes, main bathroom with spa, additional powder room and spacious laundry with ample storage. Extra features include ducted heating and cooling, plush carpet throughout and quality curtains and blinds. With a beautiful outdoor entertaining area, landscaped gardens and retaining walls, double lock-up garage and rear access with space for the boat or trailer this modern day mansion has so much on offer.
Bill Williams : 0477 277 562

Description:
Perfect Makeover/Brick Veneer Beauty
FIRST home buyers, families or investors will love this home. Take a look inside and it's easy to see why. With a recent makeover this lovely home set in a brilliant location, shines. Painted, inside and out, re-carpeted and an as new looking roof, ensure there is nothing to do except move in and lap up the luxury.
The home's cosy and inviting vibe is hard to beat. Situated in a top spot in this peaceful street, it's close to schools, public transport, a bike path and only a five-minute drive to the centre of Bendigo.
The layout includes a bedroom at the front, living room to the side which links to a spacious kitchen and two more bedrooms at the back section. Located at the rear are the laundry, bathroom and plenty of storage space. Built-in robes are a handy addition in the bedrooms. Each bedroom is flooded with light thanks to large windows.
Attractive timber floors in the living space and kitchen is an added bonus.
A gas heater in the living room, split-system in the kitchen and a ceiling fan create comfort for all seasons.
Outside the backyard is huge, fully fenced and has a child-proof gate. A lock-up shed to the side of the backyard is also handy.
This is a neat, tidy and affordable package; it's hard to beat the beauty of a solid cream brick veneer.
Insights: 27 Grace Street, White Hills VIC 3550 was last sold in 2018 and 40 other 3 bedroom house in White Hills have recently been sold.

Description:
Excellent Family Home.
Close to schools , shops, sporting facilities and other amenities ,this superb modern home only approx 5 years old, displays taste, style and quality throughout. From the large entrance through to the stately dinining room or family room, into the huge kitchen, casual dining and large lounge overlooking the rear private yard. There are 3 large bedrooms, full ensuite & WIR in main with BIR's in other rooms plus a 4th bedroom or large study. Ceiling fans in all rooms, ducted evap cooling, ducted evap heating, high ceilings, loads of natural light, attractive window shutters and double garage with auto door. Just new on the market, will not last long.

Description:
HILLTOP HOUSE
Where else could you live within 6 minutes of the Bendigo CBD, but still keep your horse and retain the rural lifestyle. Living in this immaculately presented 5 bedroom home would be one of the easiest things to do.
Perched high up on the elevated allotment of approx. 4 acres, there is sufficient room both inside and outside for the whole family to love. It wouldn't be difficult to say that you had your own “mansion” of approx. 40 squares incorporating 3 bedrooms downstairs and two bedrooms upstairs with separate living zones on each level. Whether you want to entertain in the formal lounge and dining area on the ground floor whilst other family members entertain guests in the billiard room, family room or extensive concrete entertaining deck, the possibilities for parties are endless.
The fresh and modern well-appointed kitchen looks out to the spa and rear yard and also adjoins the formal dining room.
Opportunities for outdoor play exist with a floodlit “mod grass” tennis court, cricket pitch, putting green, basketball area and paddock to keep your horse or pony. Picturesque views over both the dam (2.3 meg water right) and rear yard are a sight to be seen. An impressive large workshop of 40 x 25 x 10 with power and concrete floor will make the handyman or tradie envious. Town water, natural gas, auto watering system plus a host of other features ensure an inspection will not disappoint.
DIRECTIONS: Off Plumridge Street
Andrew Pearce : 0419 544

Description:
3 BRM in Quiet Street
Set in a nice quiet street, this spacious three bedroom W/B home has much to offer first home buyers, retirees and investors with an eye for value.
Boasting gas appliances, 9ft ceilings, separate lounge, kitchen/meals area and all recently repainted.
The polished timber floors look stunning, and the large windows let in loads of natural light. BIR's and ceiling fans are in all three bedrooms.
All set in on a level lot, the lock-up yard is ideal for pets and kids.
A 4m x 3m workshop and a double carport make this home the complete package.
Ready to move the furniture in!

Description:
LAKE WEEROONA PRECINCT
This is a unique property, tastefully updated with all the modern conveniences and situated in a great location walking distance to Lake Weeroona and close to the Bendigo CBD.
This would be ideal as a rental investment property or as a first home, comprising 3 bedrooms plus an additional study or 4th bedroom. The chic upstairs area is complete with master bedroom including a spacious & private parents with ensuite, BIR and balcony.
A lounge-room with a gas heater and new carpet, a light filled renovated kitchen with electric oven & gas hot plates, dishwasher, pantry and meals area. In addition a fantastic fully renovated three piece family bathroom and laundry. Heating is gas & evaporative cooling. Outside there is a paved sitting area, good size secure backyard with rear access and a carport.

Description:
INCREDIBLE POTENTIAL, PERFECT LOCATION!
Situated on a large allotment of almost 1000 square metres, this modernized red brick home now offers an exciting opportunity for all buyers! Whether you are a developer, investor or owner-occupier, the home suits an array of uses with subdivision opportunities (STCA) and great rental return potential. Well-presented throughout, the light-filled interior comprises two bedrooms and updated bathroom with separate toilet, large lounge, dining room and renovated kitchen. Other features include separate laundry, gas heating, air conditioning, BIRs in both bedrooms, plus an undercover outdoor entertaining area and spacious backyard complete with garden shed. A potential-packed property in a convenient location only minutes from the CBD and close to Lake Weeroona. Offers considered prior to Auction so act swiftly and inspect today!

Description:
WALK AROUND THE BOTANICAL GARDENS
Located in a quiet street a stone's throw from the botanical gardens, this solid cream brick home has all the features sought after of a property from this era.
The current owners have cared for the property and it is in immaculate condition, you will not be disappointed. All 3 bedrooms have built in robes which provide sufficient storage for the whole family. Year round comfort is provided by a gas heater to the lounge plus wall air conditioner to the dining area. The home has space & scope for families. The large rear yard on an allotment of approx. 900 sq metres allows enough room for pets, children or a workshop.
In a friendly family location, within easy reach of the CBD & all lifestyle needs.

Address: 44 St Killians Street WHITE HILLS VIC 3550
Description:
GREAT POSITION IN WHITE HILLS ON 2 ACRES APPROX. ALL SERVICES
This large home features 4 bedrooms and study. BIR's in all bedrooms and ensuite and walk in robe in main bedroom. Three living areas including formal lounge, family room and rumpus room. All warmly heated by ducted gas. All services available to this home situated on 2 street frontages, Reserve at the front and rear of property. Extra large kitchen with terrific bench space; family bathroom services three of the bedrooms. Double entrance of St.Killians to access double garaging each side of property. Gorgeous land with picturesque dam and established pine and native trees. So close to the city, but giving the kids room to move. This home is situated on 9222m2 of land with all services. Where can you get this sized land within walking distance of White Hills School, sporting facilities, Weeroona College and local transport.
Helen Ashby : 0408 42 5566

Description:
Hospital Precinct
This magnificent and modern family home is found only minutes away from the CBD and Hospital is sure to excite. With three impressively sized bedrooms plus a large study/4th bedroom, two generous living areas and a superb, paved outdoor entertaining area, this property encompasses the needs and desires of every family. The double-sized master bedroom includes a walk-in robe and ensuite and built-in robes to all other bedrooms. A sleek and contemporary deli-style kitchen overlooks the large open plan living and dining area with polished porcelain tiles and central heating and cooling throughout. With gorgeous landscaped gardens surrounding the home including your own, personal 4-hole mini golf course and a double remote-controlled garage you'll never want to leave this private oasis!

Description:
Rare block with street frontage minutes from CBD!
Start from the ground up and plan your next home or investment property on this lovely block in a rapidly growing area of White Hills. One of the last vacant blocks in the area, it is situated just a short drive to the Bendigo CBD with a bus stop and sporting facilities opposite and within walking distance to the botanic gardens. Build a better future for your family with private and public primary schools, bakery and Epsom Village shopping centre a little further down the road. The 465-square-metre allotment has street frontage with all services available. Situated so close to the city and all facilities, don't procrastinate, as one of the last blocks available in the area won't hang around long!
Michael Brooks : 0477 277 564

Description:
FIRST HOME PURCHASE
Terrific property with the loveliest reserve behind and to the side. Lounge has gas heating and a very handy split system. The home is currently set up as 2 bedrooms and an extra dining room, however the dining room could be used as a bedroom. Main bedroom has built in robes and ceiling fan as does the second bedroom. New kitchen with gas H/P's and electric oven. Great back enclosed verandah perfect for the study / home office. The access to good garaging is off side reserve and separate front parking.
Walk to Lake Weeroona and enjoy the walking track along Bendigo Creek.
Expected rental $260 per week.

Description:
OUTDOOR OASIS IN WHITE HILLS
This impressive 3 bedroom brick veneer residence on 748 m2 has many features to appeal to the discerning buyer. Located close to town in lovely White Hills this home has a walk in robe and ensuite to the main bedroom with a bay window.
The family/ meals /kitchen area is spacious, and of course there is both ducted heating and cooling throughout. The home has a huge and fabulous alfresco area that is covered and enclosed with zippered cafe blinds- perfect for cool evenings and brilliant in summer. The rear garden is an absolute delight with low maintenance lawn, meandering pathways, established fruit trees and 6 water tanks to keep them lush and flourishing. There is also an excellent shed 6 x 4m with a concrete floor. This home is beautifully presented and provides a welcome oasis.
Darryn O'Keefe : 0418 509 563

Description:
Boutique Racing Stables Over The Road From Bendigo RaceCourse
Immaculate, stunning and you will not be able to find another racing property that is going to be more convenient to access the racecourse than this one. This property has so much going for it starting with a lovely three bedroom home built by a quality builder. Expansive open plan kitchen meals and family living area, 2 bathrooms, solid fuel heating as well as split system. There is a fabulous huge enclosed pergola for all year round family/friends and owners entertainment. The horse facilities are amazing with 5 stables (4x4m),2 day yards (5x4m),spelling paddock (20x40m) and 2 tie up areas. There is a garage/feed/tack room with power and concrete approx. 4x 7m with roller door plus double carport. Extremely secure with 5 separate gates, low maintenance manicured gardens with fully concreted and asphalted drives and paths. There is an abundance of tank water as well as town water. Rear access to the property is also available. Best of all is the location, just a few doors from the Bendigo Equine Hospital, straight across the road to all the wonderful training facilities that the Bendigo Jockey Club has to offer. A must see for trainers or horse enthusiasts looking for magnificent equestrian property.
Insights: 40 other 3 bedroom house in White Hills have recently been sold.

Description:
GREAT LOCATION, GREAT PRICE!
A comfortable, renovated three bedroom home in popular White Hills. The home has been updated with new carpets, blinds and a fabulous new kitchen with breakfast bar, dishwasher and modern 900mm stainless steel upright stove. Lovely polished floor boards and downlights throughout.
Good size lounge, with gas heating and split system for all year comfort. Updated tiled three piece bathroom. Outdoor decking for entertaining anytime of the year. Good size secure backyard for kids and pets. New colour bond fencing, single garage with roller door. Additional off street parking.
Handy to all facilities including schools, shops, parks and public transport. Walk to Bendigo's CBD and Lake Weeroona. This affordable property will be hard to beat for the first home buyer, family or investor! Currently rented at $330pw.
Pop this one on your list to inspect!!

Description:
Amazing First Home or Investment Opportunity
An amazing opportunity exists at this handy address for first home buyers and investors. Offering two living areas and three generously proportioned bedrooms, the interior has the bonus of ducted gas heating and evaporative cooling. Thoroughly renovated, the kitchen-meals area contains an abundance of cupboards, dishwasher, gas cook-top and electric oven. The bathroom, separate toilet and laundry have been refurbished too, leaving nothing to finish-off inside. Nine-foot ceilings with decorative cornice and floorboards beneath the carpet, indicative of this classic style and era remain to enhance the decor. Virtually maintenance-free and surrounded by secure fencing, the backyard features a 6x7 metre Colorbond shed with concrete base, power and twin roller-doors. There is also a soft-fall play area for the kids and a sunny alfresco zone for outdoor dining. Positioned perfectly to provide for young families, it is two doors to a primary school, around the corner from a pre-school and just a few blocks from a secondary college. With a wealth of shops one block away, plus public transport and the Botanic Gardens very close-by, you'll not often need to make the short drive into the CBD. This is Value with a capital 'V'.
Paul Byrne : 0439 441 198

Description:
SLEEK AND STYLISH
From this quiet White Hills location, we present a chic home that is modern & extremely well appointed.
The open plan design is functional & will suit families or those seeking a rental investment. With two distinct living areas, plus open plan kitchen & meals, including an outside timber undercover alfresco - perfect for summer BBQ & entertaining.
Completing the picture the home has a cozy gas log fireplace, evaporative cooling, and side access from both boundaries of the block offering adequate space for the tradesman, the caravan or simply a comfortable & secure yard for the kids to enjoy. Master bedroom features a large walk in robe & ensuite. All on offer close to town, school s & amenities. The hard work has been done, with nothing left to do but enjoy!
Directions: Off St Killian Street, Lorna Court runs off to the Right.
Bec Allen : 0438 528 091

Description:
4 BEDROOMS - QUIET LOCATION
Located in a very quiet court, midway between Lake Weeroona and the Botanical Gardens, this 4 bedroom weatherboard residence is a surprise package. Well maintained over the years, the home with a hardwood timber floor has a spacious lounge, with gas heating, a/c and cf which leads to the open plan meals and kitchen- there is plenty of storage and bench space here too.
The bedrooms are a generous size and the main has BIRs. Just right as is, this property could suit an investor or a first home buyer, and with a bit of imagination and cosmetic decorative flair, this home could be a stunner. View by appointment only, call to arrange your inspection today.
Darryn O'Keefe : 0418 509 563
